page.title: 11A day in the life of Lisa
page.content: This morning I got up at twenty past seven.Mum was up so I went into the kitchen and put two pieces of bread in the toaster for my breakfast.At half past eight I got my bags and coat an kissed mum goodbye and ran for the bus to go to school. Assembly began at 9.00am.At 9.30am we went into class.We began with a notation test and a multiplication test.At playtime Sarah and I sold crisps at the school shop.After play we went to the baths and just swam lengths.After dinner me, Sharon,Sarah and Katie went outside and played fireball. At last play we practised "Joseph and His Technicolour Dreamcoat" for our school concert. At 3.30am I went home and then to my piano lesson.After that I had tea and then my dad and I went to the Salvation Army. By Lisa Davison.
